alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 20 at 3:52PM EST until January 22 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon and run high into the day on Saturday. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued 11 AM EST on Friday.
